power.title: Boar Assault
power.fluff: Each successful attack against your foe increases your tenacity

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you gain temporary hit points equal to your Strength modifier (melee attack) or Wisdom modifier (ranged attack).

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter or until the target is reduced to 0 hit points or fewer, you gain temporary hit points each time you hit the target. The temporary hit points equal your Strength modifier (if you hit with a melee attack) or your Wisdom modifier (if you hit with a ranged attack).

power.title: Commanding Confrontation
power.fluff: You launch an agonizing shot that you can capitalize on with each subsequent strike

section.name: Attack:
section.target: one creature designated as your quarry

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the target is no longer your quarry, once on each of your turns, when you deal damage to the target with a melee attack, you deal additional damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

power.title: Distracting Team
power.fluff: You distract your foe while your beast companion moves in for the kill

section.text: If you reduce the target to 0 hit points or fewer, this power is not expended.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Your beast companion moves up to its speed, and then makes the Beast Attack against the same target.

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[B] + beast's [Strength or Dexterity] modifier damage, and the target is knocked prone.

power.title: Driving the Quarry
power.fluff: You fiercely attack your quarry, and your beast companion compels it forward

section.name: Effect:
section.text: If the target is your quarry, you slide it 2 squares.
You slide your beast companion 2 squares to a space adjacent to the target. If the target is bloodied, you can slide your beast companion up to 4 squares to a space adjacent to the target instead.

section.name: Cat, Raptor, Spider, or Wolf:
section.text: Increase the maximum distance of the slide by 2 squares.

power.title: Guardian Arrow
power.fluff: You slam an arrow home and promise more if harm befalls your friend

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Choose one ally threatened by the target.

Until the end of the encounter, if the target attacks the chosen ally, you can make a ranged basic attack against the target as an immediate interrupt. Your attack must have the Weapon keyword. You cannot make this attack if the target is marked by the chosen ally.

power.title: Hunt's End
power.fluff: You carefully focus to make your attack spell your target's end

section.text: If the target is your quarry, the attack can score a critical hit on a natural roll of 18 to 20
If the target is your quarry, you can reroll any of the damage dice, but must use the second result.

power.title: Hunter's Bear Trap
power.fluff: A well-placed attack to the leg leaves your enemy hobbled and bleeding

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is hobbled (save ends).
While hobbled, the target takes ongoing 5 damage and is slowed.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target is slowed until the end of its next turn.

power.title: Isolation Strike
power.fluff: Your flurry of attacks knocks your opponents back, allowing you to focus on a single foe

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, or 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage if you only targeted one creature.
If the target is not your quarry, you can push it up to a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier to a space that is not adjacent to your quarry.

power.title: Jaws of the Wolf
power.fluff: You use your weapons to hedge in your foe and trick him into exposing a weak spot, at which point you strike

power.title: Off-Hand Defense
power.fluff: You ready your off-hand weapon to deflect incoming attacks

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain a power bonus to AC until the end end of your next turn or until you make an attack using your off-hand weapon, whichever comes first. The power bonus equals 2 + one-half your Strength modifier.
If you use your second wind or the total defense action, this effect persists until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Partnered Savaging
power.fluff: Your beast companion brutalizes the enemy as you slip in for a quick strike

section.text: If the beast reduces the target to 0 hit points or fewer, this power is not expended.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You shift up to half your speed, and then makes the Follow-up Attack against the same target.

power.title: Scything Blow
power.fluff: You lash out with your off-hand weapon in a wide ark, knocking two foes to the ground before following up with your main weapon

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] (off-hand) + Dexterity modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] (main) + Dexterity modifier damage, or 2[W] (main) + Dexterity modifier damage if you only targeted one creature with the primary attack.

power.title: Seismic Strike
power.fluff: You attack your foe, and your companion aids you in keeping foes right where they are

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, once per turn, you can use the Beast Knockdown attack at-will to command your beast companion.

power.title: Skirmishing Stance
power.fluff: You adopt a defensive, highly mobile combat stance that allows you to catch opponents unprepared

section.text: While you remain in the stance, you gain a +2 bonus to AC and Reflex against attacks triggered by your movement, and whenever you move at least 4 squares away from where you started your turn, you gain the following benefits:
+2 power bonus to AC and Reflex.
The first time you hit with an attack before the end of your next turn, the attack deals +1d8 damage.

power.title: Split the Tree
power.fluff: You fire two arrows at once so they separate mid-flight to strike two different targets

section.name: Attack:
section.target: two creatures within 3 squares of each other

section.text: Make the attack roll against both targets, take the higher result, and apply it to both targets

power.title: Sudden Strike
power.fluff: You slash your foe across the face with one weapon to make it drops its guard, and then roll to one side to strike it in the back with your other weapon

section.text: If you reduce the target to 0 hit points or fewer, this power is not expended.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You shift up to a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier to a space where you can make the secondary attack.
If both attacks hit, the target is weakened until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Sure Shot
power.fluff: You line up your shot with meticulous care to strike at your foe's vitals

section.text: You can reroll the attack, but must use the second result
You can reroll any of the damage dice, but must use the second result.
